trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around July 31st 1974
divs: Sighting Details I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHAT I SAW WAS EITHER ASTEALTH OR UFO? I KNOW WHAT VARIOUS PLANES FROM AROUND THE WORLD LOOK LIKE. WHATI SAW WAS OR DID NOT LOOK, NOR MOVE LIKE ANY AIRCRAFT FROM PAST OR TO DATE.WHILE WATCHING A MOVE AT A DRIVEIN IN UNION CITY,CA. I HAD ANOTHER SIGHTING OF AUFO- BRIGHT, ROUND SHAPED AND MOVED UP-DOWN WITH EASE, AND TOOK OFF MOVING FAST,NO SOUND MOVED THROUGH THE CLOUDS IN A FASHION NO PROFESSIONAL JET FIGHTER PILOTCULD HAVE DONE. AT DAYTON I WAS STANDING OUTDOORS. NANCIE
